Come oooon!\""},{"lineNumber":189713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ、＜エール＞！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's go, <Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":189714,"originalJapaneseLine":"　長田君投げ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Throw Nagata-kun!\""},{"lineNumber":189715,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは長田君を足下から持ち上げて、","translatedEnglishLine":"You lifted Nagata-kun from under his feet,"},{"lineNumber":189716,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵に向けて大遠投！","translatedEnglishLine":"and threw him a great distance toward the enemy!"},{"lineNumber":189717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":189718,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君は粉々に割れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun shattered into pieces."},{"lineNumber":189719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおお！　行くぞーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uoooooh! Here we gooooo!\""},{"lineNumber":189720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ、＜エール＞！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's go, <Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":189721,"originalJapaneseLine":"　長田君ガード！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guard with Nagata-kun!\""},{"lineNumber":189722,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは長田君を足下から持ち上げて、","translatedEnglishLine":"You lifted Nagata-kun from under his feet,"},{"lineNumber":189723,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵に向けて掲げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and raised him high toward the enemy."},{"lineNumber":189724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くらえーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Take this!\""},{"lineNumber":189725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaah!?\""},{"lineNumber":189726,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君は粉々に割れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun shattered into pieces."},{"lineNumber":189727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　俺死んでね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Am I dead?\""},{"lineNumber":189728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もーっ、真面目に考えろよお前はー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez, think seriously already!\""},{"lineNumber":189729,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぺちぺちぺちぺち。","translatedEnglishLine":"*pat pat pat pat.*"},{"lineNumber":189730,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは長田君に足を叩かれてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"You were just slapped on the foot by Nagata-kun"},{"lineNumber":189733,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に仲がいいねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"are really close friends, aren't they?\""},{"lineNumber":189734,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは長田君と友情をより深められた気がした。","translatedEnglishLine":"You felt that your friendship with Nagata-kun had deepened."},{"lineNumber":189735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おら、これから＜エール＞様に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, from now on I will"},{"lineNumber":189736,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誠心誠意お仕えさせていただきますだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"serve Lord <Yell> with all my heart and soul!\""},{"lineNumber":189737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ぺこり」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"... *bows*\""},{"lineNumber":189738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぺこり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"*bow*...\""},{"lineNumber":189739,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはドッス、ワッス、二人のテントを訪ねた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You visited the tent of Doss and Wass."},{"lineNumber":189740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お茶です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here's some tea...\""},{"lineNumber":189741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うっす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thanks.\""},{"lineNumber":189742,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは黙ったままお茶を一口啜った。","translatedEnglishLine":"You silently took a sip of the tea."},{"lineNumber":189743,"originalJapaneseLine":"「菓子も……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here are some sweets too...\""},{"lineNumber":189744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うっす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thanks.\""},{"lineNumber":189745,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは黙ったままお菓子を一口かじった。","translatedEnglishLine":"You silently took a bite of the sweets."},{"lineNumber":189746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前ら、なんか会話しろよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you guys, say something!\""},{"lineNumber":189747,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は町を出発しようとしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You were about to leave the town."},{"lineNumber":189748,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーっ、いやー、買った買った。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, yeah, we bought a lot."},{"lineNumber":189749,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大量に買ったっすねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"We bought a huge amount, didn't we.\""},{"lineNumber":189750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「次の町は遠いだすからね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The next town is far away, you things,"},{"lineNumber":189752,"originalJapaneseLine":"　結構な量になってしまいましただすな」","translatedEnglishLine":"it ended up being quite a lot.\""},{"lineNumber":189753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よいっ……せっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heave-ho...!\""},{"lineNumber":189754,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキーが荷物を重たげに担いだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky carried the heavy load with effort."},{"lineNumber":189755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………う、ぐ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"... Ugh.\""},{"lineNumber":189756,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキーは顔を歪ませてピタリと動きを止めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky grimaced and stopped moving completely."},{"lineNumber":189757,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら重すぎて動くことが出来ないようだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, it was too heavy for him to move."},{"lineNumber":189758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっぱ無理ですって、その量は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That amount is definitely impossible to carry...\""},{"lineNumber":189759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うし車でも雇います？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Should we hire an ox cart or something?\""},{"lineNumber":189760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いやいや……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, no...\""},{"lineNumber":189761,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな無駄遣いをさせるわけにはいかないだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't let us waste money like that."},{"lineNumber":189762,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな荷物くらいおらが……","translatedEnglishLine":"I can handle a load like this..."},{"lineNumber":189763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、言ったってなぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That said...\""},{"lineNumber":189764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しゃーない、みんなで分担して持とう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it can't be helped. Let's divide the load among everyone."},{"lineNumber":189765,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それならなんとか……","translatedEnglishLine":"That way, we can manage somehow...\""},{"lineNumber":189766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっす……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright...\""},{"lineNumber":189767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うっす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Alright.\""},{"lineNumber":189768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、ドッスさんにワッスさん！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, Doss-san and Wass-san!?\""},{"lineNumber":189769,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドッスとワッスの二人が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Doss and Wass,"},{"lineNumber":189770,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキーの荷物を優しく下ろす。","translatedEnglishLine":"gently set down Rocky's load."},{"lineNumber":189771,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、二人は荷物をテキパキと二つに分けると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, the two quickly divided the load into two parts,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおお！　来ーーーーい！」
あなたは長田君を足下から持ち上げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You lifted Nagata-kun from under his feet,
and threw him a great distance toward the enemy!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおお！　行くぞーーー！」
あなたは長田君を足下から持ち上げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You lifted Nagata-kun from under his feet,
and raised him high toward the enemy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もーっ、真面目に考えろよお前はー！」
あなたは長田君に足を叩かれてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were just slapped on the foot by Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、＜エール＞ちゃんと長田君は

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are really close friends, aren't they?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君と友情をより深められた気がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You felt that your friendship with Nagata-kun had deepened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誠心誠意お仕えさせていただきますだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: serve Lord <Yell> with all my heart and soul!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはドッス、ワッス、二人のテントを訪ねた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You visited the tent of Doss and Wass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは黙ったままお茶を一口啜った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You silently took a sip of the tea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは黙ったままお菓子を一口かじった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You silently took a bite of the sweets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は町を出発しようとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were about to leave the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーっ、いやー、買った買った。
大量に買ったっすねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We bought a huge amount, didn't we."
"The next town is far away, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食料と備蓄品とその他諸々、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Food, supplies, and other various things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構な量になってしまいましただすな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it ended up being quite a lot."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーが荷物を重たげに担いだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky carried the heavy load with effort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーは顔を歪ませてピタリと動きを止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky grimaced and stopped moving completely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら重すぎて動くことが出来ないようだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, it was too heavy for him to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっぱ無理ですって、その量は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That amount is definitely impossible to carry..."
Should we hire an ox cart or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな無駄遣いをさせるわけにはいかないだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't let us waste money like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな荷物くらいおらが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can handle a load like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しゃーない、みんなで分担して持とう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it can't be helped. Let's divide the load among everyone.
That way, we can manage somehow..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、ドッスさんにワッスさん！？」
ドッスとワッスの二人が、
ロッキーの荷物を優しく下ろす。
そして、二人は荷物をテキパキと二つに分けると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, the two quickly divided the load into two parts,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおお！　来ーーーーい！」
あなたは長田君を足下から持ち上げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You lifted Nagata-kun from under his feet,
and threw him a great distance toward the enemy!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおお！　行くぞーーー！」
あなたは長田君を足下から持ち上げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You lifted Nagata-kun from under his feet,
and raised him high toward the enemy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もーっ、真面目に考えろよお前はー！」
あなたは長田君に足を叩かれてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were just slapped on the foot by Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、＜エール＞ちゃんと長田君は

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are really close friends, aren't they?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君と友情をより深められた気がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You felt that your friendship with Nagata-kun had deepened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誠心誠意お仕えさせていただきますだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: serve Lord <Yell> with all my heart and soul!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはドッス、ワッス、二人のテントを訪ねた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You visited the tent of Doss and Wass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは黙ったままお茶を一口啜った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You silently took a sip of the tea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは黙ったままお菓子を一口かじった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You silently took a bite of the sweets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は町を出発しようとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were about to leave the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーっ、いやー、買った買った。
大量に買ったっすねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We bought a huge amount, didn't we."
"The next town is far away, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構な量になってしまいましただすな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it ended up being quite a lot."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーが荷物を重たげに担いだ。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That amount is definitely impossible to carry..."
Should we hire an ox cart or something?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't let us waste money like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな荷物くらいおらが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can handle a load like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しゃーない、みんなで分担して持とう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it can't be helped. Let's divide the load among everyone.
That way, we can manage somehow..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、ドッスさんにワッスさん！？」
ドッスとワッスの二人が、
ロッキーの荷物を優しく下ろす。
そして、二人は荷物をテキパキと二つに分けると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, the two quickly divided the load into two parts,
